system.effect:
Trigger: When spending at least 1 hour training your Pokémon.
Effect: Your Pokémon of Friendship 3 or Higher, start the day with an additional Spirit, and their Max spirit is increased by 1 as long as they benefit from Training.

@UUID[Compendium.ptu.effects.Item.5t4UKwwwfctpppb5]

Bonus: You start each day with your own Spirit value that is equivalent to the ½ the number of Pokémon you carry that have 3 Spirit or more, you can spend these as if any Pokémon had this Spirit when applicable.
Note: Scale this to the number of Pokemon trainers are permitted to carry.
prerequisites: Adept Intuition and Novice Pokémon Education

ptu.prereqBackup: Adept Intuition and Novice Pokémon Education, or Mystic Senses
